32#ifndef _LINUX_HASHTABLE_H_
33#define _LINUX_HASHTABLE_H_
34
35#include <sys/cdefs.h>
36
37#include <linux/list.h>
38
39#define DECLARE_HASHTABLE(name, bits) \
40 struct hlist_head name[1u << (bits)]
41
42static inline void
43__hash_init(struct hlist_head *hash, unsigned n)
44{
45
46 while (n --> 0)
47 INIT_HLIST_HEAD(&hash[n]);
48}
49
50static inline bool
51__hash_empty(struct hlist_head *hash, unsigned n)
52{
53
54 while (n --> 0) {
55 if (!hlist_empty(&hash[n]))
56 return false;
57 }
58
59 return true;
60}
61
62#define hash_init(h) __hash_init((h), __arraycount(h))
63#define hash_add(h, n, k) hlist_add_head(n, &(h)[(k) % __arraycount(h)])
64#define hash_del(n) hlist_del_init(n)
65#define hash_empty(h) __hash_empty((h), __arraycount(h))
66#define hash_for_each_possible(h, n, f, k) \
67 hlist_for_each_entry(n, &(h)[(k) % __arraycount(h)], f)
68#define hash_for_each_safe(h, i, t, n, f) \
69 for ((i) = 0; (i) < __arraycount(h); (i)++) \
70 hlist_for_each_entry_safe(n, t, &(h)[i], f)
71
72#endif /*_LINUX_HASHTABLE_H_*/
73
